title.rendered: Nuevo disco de Amenra para otoño y gira europea

content.rendered:
Amenra debutarán en Neurot Recordings este otoño con Mass V, pero antes estarán por Europa presentandolo. A continuación podéis ver las fechas:

10/27/2012 Hard Club – Porto, Portugal @ Amplifest [info]
11/03/2012 Leeds University Union – Leeds, UK @ Damnation Festival [info]
12/01/2012 Db’s – Utrecht, NL @ Le Guess Who Festival [info]
12/22/2012 Ancienne Belgique – Brussels, Belgium *record release show [info]
2/10/20102 De Kreun – Kortrijk, Belgium [info]
4/19/2013 Patronaat Church – Tilburg, Netherlands @ Roadburn Festival [info]
5/05/2013 Klub Firlej – Wroclaw, Poland @ Asymmetry Festival [info]

Fuente: Earsplit Compound
